text:
Sandhya was very ashamed of herself.
 For the atonement of her sin she decided to do penance.
 She went to Chandrabhaga mountain and commenced her tremendous penance.
 Lord Brahma then instructed Vashishtha to go to her in disguise and help in getting her initiated.
 He went to Chandrabhaga mountain in the guise of a brahmin and gave the mantra - OM NAMAH SHANKARAYA OM to her and also told her the methods of doing worship, then he returned back.
title: Sandhya does Penance
